Join Sissy Goff and David Thomas this week as they visit with Jessica Turner, author, speaker, and creative mom of 3, on fun summer activity ideas.

Grab links, stats, and quotes you want to remember in the show notes at  https://www.gominno.com/parents/rbg-podcast-jessica-turner-interview/

Connect with Sissy, David, and Melissa at raisingboysandgirls.com
